name: Saving The Alpacas
description: This game was made for the 2021 Secret Santa Jam. I decided to use Unity as while I prefer Unreal overall I know it's 2d is somewhat lackluster. This was the first real 2D game I have made in Unity, I made a game entirely in UI using Unity before, and while I ran into a few oddities about Unity it did okay overall. I ended up being quite a bit busier during the jam than I expected so I only got a few days to work on the game, but hopefully its still fun!
